content: अनुष्टुभ् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (°स्तुभ्) To praise after, follow in praising.

अनुष्टुभ् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [अनु निरंतरं स्तुभ्यतेऽनया अनुष्टुप् वाक्] {@--1@} Following in praise; speech. {@--2@} Sarasvatī. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a class of metres consisting of four Pādas of {8} syllables each, the whole stanza consisting of 32 syllables (so called because it follows with its praise {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} अनुष्टोभति the gāyatrī, which has {3} Pādas), अनुष्टोभनादनुष्टुप्. In later metrical systems it stands as a general name for all metres which have {8} syllables in each foot (the highest possible number being computed to be 256); पंचमं लघु सर्वत्र सप्तमं द्विचतुर्थयोः . गुरु षष्ठं च पादानां शेषेष्वनियमो मतः .. which rule is sometimes violated.
